replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
0、更换其他浏览器

1、试试手机开热点或者手机流量上

2、或者试试这个：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... =778175&ordertype=1

3、或者用这个
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 774928&pid=12617201
下载插件：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 774928&pid=12616793

4、还不行给你远程操作吧

replies.author: 神秘人233
replies.txt_content:
把广告拦截器关了
如adblock不会的话请回复我

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
请按照reCaptcha的方法安装header editor
然后按照此贴子中教程恢复验证码操作
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 175&ordertype=1
